name: Main Workflow
nodeGraphMarkdown: graph LR;A[Create Requirements] --> B[Create Design];B --> C[Write Code];C --> D[Test and Validate];D --> E[End];

name: Subworkflow - Test and Validate
nodeGraphMarkdown: graph LR;A[Write Test Case] --> B[Do Functional Testing];B --> C[Do Visual Testing];C --> D[Raise Defects If Any];D --> E[End];
